job_tasks.phrase: As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the role as a Software Engineer working on customer engagements, integrating and utilizing Microsoft's AI offerings, which falls under traditional software development and integration of AI services into solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of software engineering roles, working with different teams to deliver value and improve products, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the development of solutions in collaboration with customers, a key task in software engineering and integration projects.

job_tasks.phrase: This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform.
job_tasks.justification: This points to the creation of reusable software assets and solution patterns, which is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the collaborative software engineering aspect of applying skills to solve customer challenges.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions participating in architecture design and coding sprints, which are fundamental software development activities, specifically in the context of building AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the need to be a hands-on software engineer and write quality code, which is the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This describes bringing expertise to an engineering crew with end-to-end ownership, reinforcing the software engineering and integration focus.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves collaboration to build reusable software assets and playbooks, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand User Requirements
job_tasks.justification: This is a high-level task that involves understanding business needs to guide technical solutions, aligning with Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer needs and translating them into product roadmaps, which is a key aspect of business understanding and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: help customers grow their business
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on business outcomes for customers, aligning with Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: help solve our customer challenges
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes understanding and solving customer business challenges, fitting into Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves guiding design decisions to meet business needs for AI solutions, which falls under Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.
job_tasks.justification: This clarifies the role's focus, distinguishing it from a pure data science role and emphasizing its engineering and business-solution orientation.

job_tasks.justification: This describes working together towards a common goal, which is a form of collaboration.

job_tasks.justification: Working directly with customers implies communication and understanding their needs.

job_tasks.phrase: We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success.

job_tasks.justification: A 'growth mindset' is directly related to continuous learning and adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (1.A.1), such as coding, architecture design, and developing reusable assets. While it mentions AI offerings like Azure ML and Azure OpenAI, it explicitly states 'This is not a data scientist role' and that a data science team will partner with the engineer. The focus is on integrating and building solutions around AI, rather than developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves. The role involves understanding user requirements and business challenges (1.C.1) and requires strong collaboration (3.1) and a growth mindset (3.2). Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that uses AI features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role, explicitly stating it's not a data scientist role and focusing on software engineering aspects. The responsibilities and required skills align well with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, making the classification straightforward.
